mapper.sql: PK_ID, MISSION_TYPE, GROUP_ID, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, DESCRIPTION, PUBLISH_TIME, BOOK_NUM, SIGN_UP_NUM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, STATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from T_MISSION
order by ${orderByClause}

update T_MISSION
PK_ID = #{record.pkId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MISSION_TYPE = #{record.missionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GROUP_ID = #{record.groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

PUBLISH_TIME = #{record.publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BOOK_NUM = #{record.bookNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIGN_UP_NUM = #{record.signUpNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
